Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Almudena Araceli Morales at a charity gala in Madrid. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
With a career spanning nearly 20 years, Almudena Araceli Morales has established herself as a key player in the industry.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Almudena Araceli Morales is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Almudena received her secondary school diploma from IES Luis Vives Zaragoza in 1999.
Almudena graduated from IESE Business School in 2005, completing her higher education.
Moreover she completed her extra university education at Polytechnic University of Catalonia in 2009.
Occupation History:
Almudena Araceli Morales is a 44 year old Fleet Manager from Spain. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Almudena Araceli Morales's first role was as a Ship Broker at Elcano Shipping Company S.A., where she worked diligently from 2005 to 2006 to establish a strong reputation.
After gaining experience, she took on the role of Shipping Company Owner at Transmediterránea S.A. in 2008, further expanding her skill set.
From 2013 till now, she served as a Fleet Manager at Peñarroya Shipping S.A., solidifying her position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 270000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
She owns townhouse in Zaragoza, where she resides. It is worth 931000 EUR.

She purchased flat in Cuenca, where she spends her holidays. It is valued at 790000 EUR.
She inherited 4630000 EUR from her grandmother, a well-known Neurosurgeon, in 2010, allowing her to expand her investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
